name: God's Thirst
description:
You have angered the god of war, Ares , and now you are forced to fight in a 1v1 gladiator arena to kill and sacrifice your opponent just for the fun of the gods.

You have to choose, it's your life or theirs.

Controls

Move: W,A,S,D
Attack: LMB
Use shield: RMB
Sprint: LSHIFT
Grab opponent: E
Throw opponent: Q

*If any error occures please refresh the browser or play the downloadable version of the game.
